title: LLDSIMEX 1Ton Arbor Press With Hand Wheel
features: Equipped with a hand wheel to perform light and quick press work
Solid anvil surface for tough pounding and shaping tasks
Design fro riverting,squeezing,bending,pinching,flattening,removing a bearing or pressing in bearing
machined anvil has 4 slots to provide convenient support for workpieces that vary in size and shape, The Hole of end of the ram 3/8" Dia.
description: Maximum distance between the Ram and the Anvil: The maximum distance from the ram to the anvil is 5.25 inches
The 10# part Anvil size: Thickness: 19mm, and the hole size(4 hole) is 15,20,25,35mm
Ram Size: 1 inch square by 9 3/4" long
Maximum working height: The manual claims 6 1/8 inches, but the physical unit has only 6 inches of working space with the anvil removed.
Supply comes with three punches and a magnetic inserrts to hold the punch. Press is equipped with handwheel to perform light presswork
